name: Conquerona
description:
Conquerona is a Top-Down Shooter RPG game that is created by NextGen,  a group of budding students, as their first prototype product to showcase their talents and skills when it comes to game development!

MyreFalls has once again been plagued by the Coronavirus years after the Coronavirus pandemic has ended. This time around, the Coronavirus is much stronger and evolves quicker than the creation of the vaccine. Nobody knows how it reappeared, but there is one thing that that needs to be done; Vaccinate everyone as soon as possible before the next strain appears. 

Play as a newbie front liner named Kael and vaccinate all of the infected civilians  using your Spray Gun and Syringe as you venture within the Top Down Perspective pixel art graphic town of MyreFalls and uncover the origins of the virus and the past of Kael.


Controls 

  • WASD keys or Arrow keys to move
  • Use your mouse cursor to point 
  • Left mouse button to use item
  • Press the blue button to interact with the environment
  • Press V to change your equipment

This game is still under in development, any bugs and other issues that you encounter will be updated with a new version that would have removed that bug.
